data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of Dima Charpentier, 1825 from China (Coleoptera: Elateridae: Dendrometrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruan, Yongying, Kundrata, Robin, Sormova, Eliska, Qiu, Lu, Zhang, Mengna, Jiang, Shihong (2018): Description of two new species of Dima Charpentier, 1825 from China (Coleoptera: Elateridae: Dendrometrinae). Zootaxa 4526 (4): 589-599, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4526.4.10
